name: Handmade Glitterfarm Crates - Slim
description:
The crate shop is closed for the season, but I'll reopen again this spring. Add your name to my list to get an email as soon as the crates are available again.

 Just like the vintage Coke and Pepsi crates that inspired them, my fun wood Glitterfarm crates have a ton of uses!

♥ party table silverware holders ♥ rustic serving trays ♥ photo props ♥ organize magazines ♥ organize baby changing table items ♥ Makeup organizer ♥ remote control organizer ♥ Office in-boxes ♥ organize sewing/quilting/crafting supplies

♥ Craftsmanship - I "weather" each crate to give them the telltale signs age: worn edges and corners, a soft, chalky finish, and time-softened dings, scratches, scuffs, and fading, plus gray-black weathered wood. You decide whether you tell friends it's new, or that you found it at the best barn sale ever : ) Each one is handmade of wood right here at Glitterfarm. ♥ Dimensions/Colors - 6"W x 17"L x 5.5"H, and 13 colors: Apple, Sweetpea (pink), Farmhouse (white), Night, Straw, Barn (red), Natural (unpainted), Sky, Cloud, and Cuppa Jo (Dark Brown)

(NOTE: the gold and silver are a little more expensive because the paint is more expensive.)

♥ Shipping - Crates usually ship within 3 weeks of being ordered.

Domestic shipping is $13 for the first crate, but only $5 for each additional Slim crate.

name: CeCe Caldwell's Paint from Glitterfarm
description:
The Glitterfarm Paint store is now open! We feature CeCe Caldwell's environmentally-friendly chalk and clay paint, as well as all of her water-based finishes.

Come explore the new Glitterfarm Paint Store:

http://shop.glitterfarm.com

name: Glitterfarm Wine Barrel Ring Hearts
description:
I hand shape each of these hearts from a tempered steel wine barrel ring I source from Central California wineries. Every one is unique in its level of rust, its patina, and the form its final heart shape takes.

♥ Four Distressed Colors! Metal/rust not your thing? Now you can choose from four colors for your heart: Barn (red), Sweetpea (Pink), Farmhouse (White), or Sky (light blue). Click on the pictures for examples. ♥ Easy to hang - Glitterfarm hearts have a loop in the center that make it a snap to hang them on one hook or nail. ♥ Dimensions - Since barrel rings vary in diameter depending on where they are on the wine barrel, the hearts vary a bit in size. They're 22" to 27" W x 19" to 24" H x 1.25" to 2" thick. ♥ More Affordable Shipping! Domestic shipping is now just $7 for the first heart, and $5 for each additional one. I do ship internationally. Message me for the shipping cost.

name: Vintage French Grain Sack Market Tote - Red/Turquoise Stripe
description:
This bag began life decades ago as a French grain sack. I source these sacks from Europe, and make them into cute, market totes, great for shopping, pool, or beach.

This is a one-of-a-kind bag, lined with vintage cotton and featuring a magnetic enclosure. The inside pocket is perfect for sunglasses, keys, or a phone. All the fabric is vintage, so you'll undoubtedly see the color variations and character of its former life (holding the ingredients for baguettes and yummy pastries!)

Measures 16.5" wide x 15.5" tall by 3" deep, with a 17" strap (Distance from your shoulder to the top of the bag). Strap is 1.75" wide.

COLOR: Outside is the natural color of the grain sack material, with the red and blue stripes shown; inside is a natural vintage cotton.

I ship to countries other than those listed. Just contact me for a shipping quote before you purchase.

name: Vintage French Grain Sack Market Tote - Chambray Stripe
description: These two bags began life decades ago as a French grain sack. I source these sacks from Europe, and made them into these cute, market totes, great for shopping, pool, or beach. There are two versions: one has a square bottom, and one is flat (see the second photo for the differences). Both are lined with vintage cotton and feature a magnetic enclosure. The inside pocket is perfect for sunglasses, keys, or a phone. All the fabric is vintage, so you'll undoubtedly see the color variations and character of its former life (holding the ingredients for baguettes and yummy pastries!) Squared Bottom Version: Measures 15" wide x 14" tall by 3" deep, with a 17" strap (Distance from your shoulder to the top of the bag). Strap is 1.75" wide. Flat Bottom Version: Measures 18" wide x 18" tall, with a 17" strap (Distance from your shoulder to the top of the bag). Strap is 1.75" wide. COLOR: Outside is the natural color of the grain sack material, with the red and blue stripes shown; inside is a natural vintage cotton. I ship to countries other than those listed. Just contact me for a shipping quote before you purchase.

name:
Glitterfarm Girl Tee Shirt
(Slim Fit)
description: Whether you're hunting for treasure at a flea market, sipping bubbly at a chic party, or letting loose at a barn dance, a Glitterfarm Girl tee is the perfect way to declare your sparkly attitude. They're 100% cotton, and the front says "Glitterfarm Girl" with "Always Sparkle. Glitterfarm • California" on the back. Your Favorite Design This is our first tee! Glitterfarm Girls on my preview list voted for this design, with the styles and sizes everyone asked for, too. Colors: Choose black (pink printing) or turquoise (dark brown printing). What's "Slim Fit"? These are ladies' fitted tees. The light fabric is soft 'n' stretchy, and the sleeves are a bit more snug. All the pics in this listing show the Slim Fit. If you prefer your tees a little roomier, try the "Comfy Fit" instead. Sizes: IMPORTANT! Slim fit tees run a little small. For example, I'm wearing an XL in the picture and my mom is wearing a 2XL. You may want to choose one size up from the tee shirt size you usually wear. Take a look at the group shot with the models: Model       Usual Size     In Pic   Ellie            M                       XL   Polly           XL                     XXL   Sarah          M                       L   Kate             M                       L   Jenny          M/L                   XL 2XL Sizes: The printer charges me $2 extra for 2XL tees, so that's why this size costs $2 extra. U.S. and International Shipping! Shipping just $5 to U. S. and Canadian addresses. Only $8 to over 15 other countries! If your country doesn't show up, just email me for a shipping quote. Delivery: I'll order our shirts on Feb. 1, and start mailing them via USPS on the day I get them back from the printer. U.S. residents should get theirs around the 3rd week in February, but definitely by the end of the month. International orders will arrive a bit later. Exchanges: I will order a limited number of extra shirts for exchanges. Let me know if you want to exchange your unwashed, unworn tee, and I'll tell you if I have the size you want. Then, ship it back to me, and as soon as I get it, I'll send your replacement for just the cost of return shipping ($5 domestic. $8 international). Returns: I want you to love your Glitterfarm Girl tee! If you don't, just return the unworn, unwashed tee within 14 days of receiving it, and I'll refund the cost of the shirt.

name:
Glitterfarm Girl Tee Shirt
(Comfy Fit)
description: Whether you're hunting for treasure at a flea market, sipping bubbly at a chic party, or letting loose at a barn dance, a Glitterfarm Girl tee is the perfect way to declare your sparkly attitude. They're 100% cotton, and the front says "Glitterfarm Girl" with "Always Sparkle. Glitterfarm • California" on the back. Your Favorite Design This is our first tee! Glitterfarm Girls on my preview list voted for this design, with the styles and sizes everyone asked for, too. Colors: The Comfy Fit style is available in black with pink printing. What's "Comfy Fit"? These are ladies' tees, with a sturdier, more traditional tee shirt fabric. They have a roomier cut, and the sleeves are a little looser. If you prefer your tees a little more fitted, try the "Slim Fit" instead. Sizes: Available in Small through 4XL. The printer charges me $2 extra for 2XL tees, $3 extra for 3XL tees, and $4 extra for 4XL tees, so that's why these sizes cost a little more. U.S. and International Shipping! Shipping just $5 to U. S. and Canadian addresses. Only $8 to over 15 other countries! If your country doesn't show up, just email me for a shipping quote. Delivery: I'll order our shirts on Feb. 1, and start mailing them via USPS on the day I get them back from the printer. U.S. residents should get theirs around the 3rd week in February, but definitely by the end of the month. International orders will arrive a bit later. Exchanges: I will order a limited number of extra shirts for exchanges. Let me know if you want to exchange your unwashed, unworn tee, and I'll tell you if I have the size you want. Then, ship it back to me, and as soon as I get it, I'll send your replacement for just the cost of return shipping ($5 domestic. $8 international). Returns: I want you to love your Glitterfarm Girl tee! If you don't, just return the unworn, unwashed tee within 14 days of receiving it, and I'll refund the cost of the shirt.

name: Vintage French Grain Sack Market Tote - Yellow/Green Lining
description: These bags began life decades ago as a French grain sack. I source each sack from Europe, and made them into two cute, market totes, great for shopping, pool, or beach. I squared the base and used sturdy cotton webbing for the strap. The bags are unique, because I lined them with a vintage cotton table cloth. There's also a pocket inside for sunglasses, keys or a phone. All the fabric is vintage, so you'll undoubtedly see the color variations and character of its former life (holding the ingredients for baguettes and yummy pastries!) MEASURES: 16" Wide x 14" Tall x 3" deep, with a 15" strap (Distance from your shoulder to the top of the bag). Strap is 1.75" wide. COLOR: Outside is the natural color of the grain sack material; inside is a vintage cotton print tablecloth pattern featuring blues and pinks. OPTIONS: I have one other version of this bag with a print table cloth that uses blues and pinks for the lining, and is slightly larger. SHIPPING: Shipping to the U.S. is $8, and Canada is $10. UK, New Zealand, Australia, and Ireland $18. I ship to countries other than those listed. Just contact me for a shipping quote before you purchase.
